details.card_description: Each chest contains 6 random potions or contracts of rare or better quality

name: Gold Mithral Hall Chest (DO NOT USE)
name_plural: Gold Mithral Hall Chests (DO NOT USE)

details.card_description: Each chest contains 5 items (one equipment item for a random unlocked Champion, one gem card, one bounty contract, one blacksmith contract, and one potion) with rarities from Common to Rare.
